web/src/components/machines/MachineCard..description: Failover dropdown now has full keyboard navigation: useRef for trigger/menu/buttons, useCallback for keydown handler, focus trapping with Tab, Arrow Up/Down navigation, Enter/Space selection, Escape to close with focus return, Home/End keys, and click-outside detection.

web/src/components/tailadmin-ui/index.js.description: DropdownMenu component uses React Context for state (isOpen, setIsOpen). It has basic click-outside detection but no keyboard navigation or ARIA attributes. Needs aria-expanded, aria-haspopup on trigger, and role='menu'/role='menuitem' on content/items.

web/src/components/Tooltip.jsx.description: Tooltip.jsx already has good accessibility patterns: uses role='tooltip', has aria-label on HelpTooltip component, and handles focus/blur events. Can use as reference for accessibility patterns.
